title: Building State Capacity and Productivity Center Financial Transparency Resources | U.S. Department of Education
text: The Building State Capacity and Productivity Center Financial Transparency Resources have been develop to assist SEAs in their individual efforts to increase financial transparency Title: Building State Capacity and Productivity Center Financial Transparency Resources Description: The resources here have been develop to assist SEAs in their individual efforts to increase financial transparency. These resources include: - Financial Transparency 101 webinar - Equity and Transparency video series - "Moving from Data Inventory to Action" paper - The Productivity Opportunity: A Role-Playing Activity to Engage Leaders in Financial and Outcomes Data Publish Date: 2017
